metadata.title: CVE-2020-11608 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.6.1.drivers/media/usb/gspca/ov519.c allows NULL pointer dereferences inov511_mode_init_regs and ov518_mode_init_regs when there are zeroendpoints, aka CID-998912346c0d.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11608` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-24-generic - 5.4.0-24.28
linux-image-5.4.0-24-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-24.28
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-24-generic - 5.4.0-24.28
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-24-lowlatency - 5.4.0-24.28
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1007-kvm - 5.4.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1008-aws - 5.4.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1009-azure - 5.4.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1008-gcp - 5.4.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1008-oracle - 5.4.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.6.0-1007-oem - 5.6.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1008-raspi - 5.4.0-1008.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-24.28').
linux-kvm package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1007.7').
linux-aws package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1008.8').
linux-azure package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1009.9').
linux-gcp package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1008.8').
linux-oracle package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1008.8').
linux-raspi2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
linux-oem-5.6 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.6.0-1007.7').
linux-raspi package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1008.8').
